name: Let's Play: Journalists
overview: Get your camera ready and keep your note pad close by, its time to investigate the mysterious case of the missing animals! - Use the dark room to process your photos and select the best pictures for your story. - Each day brings new missions and adventures for you to complete. - Collect evidence to find out who is stealing dogs and cats in your town. - Get the chance to interview interesting people who can help you on the case!
